languages.text: {n}Пальцы чародея, закованные в громоздкие рукавицы, листают страницы внушительного тома, обитого грубой темной кожей. Заслышав ваши шаги, Уралон Жестокий отрывается от книги и обнажает свои неровные острые зубы в улыбке.{/n} "Приветствую тебя, чемпион. Пришла пора пролить кровь ложноверцев? Или же путь Истины привел тебя ко мне по иной причине?"

{n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"
languages.original_text: {n}Пальцы чародея, закованные в громоздкие рукавицы, листают страницы внушительного тома, обитого грубой темной кожей. Заслышав ваши шаги, Уралон Жестокий отрывается от книги и обнажает свои неровные острые зубы в улыбке.{/n} "Приветствую тебя, чемпион. Пришла пора пролить кровь ложноверцев? Или же путь Истины привел тебя ко мне по иной причине?"

Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"

languages.text: {n}Protégés par des gantelets lourds, les doigts du sorcier parcourent les pages d'un grand livre relié de cuir brut noir. Dès qu'il entend vos pas, Uralon le Cruel se détourne de sa lecture et retrousse les lèvres, dévoilant une rangée de dents pointues et irrégulières.{/n} « Je vous salue, {mf|champion|championne}. L'heure est-elle venue de verser le sang des mécréants ? Ou la voie de la vérité vous a-t-elle {mf|mené|menée} jusqu'à moi pour une autre raison ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Protégés par des gantelets lourds, les doigts du sorcier parcourent les pages d'un grand livre relié de cuir brut noir. Dès qu'il entend vos pas, Uralon le Cruel se détourne de sa lecture et retrousse les lèvres, dévoilant une rangée de dents pointues et irrégulières.{/n} « Je vous salue, {mf|champion|championne}. L'heure est-elle venue de verser le sang des mécréants ? Ou la voie de la vérité vous a-t-elle {mf|mené|menée} jusqu'à moi pour une autre raison ? »

languages.text: {n}Los dedos del hechicero, protegidos por guanteletes pesados, hojean las páginas de un enorme libro encuadernado en cuero oscuro y áspero. Al oír tus pasos, Uralon el Cruel aparta la mirada del volumen y muestra sus dientes afilados y desiguales.{/n} «Saludos, campe{mf|ón|ona}. ¿Es hora de derramar la sangre de los infieles? ¿O te trae la Verdad hasta mí con otro propósito?».
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos del hechicero, protegidos por guanteletes pesados, hojean las páginas de un enorme libro encuadernado en cuero oscuro y áspero. Al oír tus pasos, Uralon el Cruel aparta la mirada del volumen y muestra sus dientes afilados y desiguales.{/n} «Saludos, campe{mf|ón|ona}. ¿Es hora de derramar la sangre de los infieles? ¿O te trae la Verdad hasta mí con otro propósito?».

languages.text: {n}重いガントレットをはめたソーサラーの指が、ざらざらした黒っぽい革で装丁された大きな書物のページをめくっている。あなたの足音を耳にした残酷なウラロンは書物から目線を外し、鋭く不揃いな歯をむき出しにする。{/n}「歓迎しよう、英雄よ。不信心者の血を流す時が来たのか？それとも真理の道が別の目的でお前を連れてきたのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"

traits.locale_text: {n}重いガントレットをはめたソーサラーの指が、ざらざらした黒っぽい革で装丁された大きな書物のページをめくっている。あなたの足音を耳にした残酷なウラロンは書物から目線を外し、鋭く不揃いな歯をむき出しにする。{/n}「歓迎しよう、英雄よ。不信心者の血を流す時が来たのか？それとも真理の道が別の目的でお前を連れてきたのか？」

languages.text: {n}这位巫师戴着厚重的铁手套，正在翻阅一本用粗糙的深色皮革装订的大部头著作。他听到了你的脚步声，将目光从书页中移开，露出了他锋利的锯齿状牙齿。{/n}“向你致敬，勇士。是时候让伪神的信徒流血了吗？还是说，真理之路将你带到这里别有目的？”
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位巫师戴着厚重的铁手套，正在翻阅一本用粗糙的深色皮革装订的大部头著作。他听到了你的脚步声，将目光从书页中移开，露出了他锋利的锯齿状牙齿。{/n}“向你致敬，勇士。是时候让伪神的信徒流血了吗？还是说，真理之路将你带到这里别有目的？”

languages.text: {n}Der Hexer blättert mit seinen behandschuhten Fingern durch die Seiten eines in dunkles Leder gebundenen Buches. Als er deine Schritte hört, wendet sich Uralon der Grausame von dem Folianten ab und entblößt seine scharfen, unregelmäßigen Zähne.{/n} "Ich grüße Euch, Champion. Wird es Zeit, das Blut von Ungläubigen zu vergießen? Oder führt Euch der Pfad der Wahrheit aus anderen Gründen zu mir?"
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"

Wird es Zeit, das Blut von Ungläubigen zu vergießen? Oder führt Euch der Pfad der Wahrheit aus anderen Gründen zu mir?"

languages.text: {n}Sahirin ağır zırheldivenlerle kaplı parmakları; sert, kara bir deriyle kaplı büyük bir kitabın sayfalarını çeviriyor. Adım seslerini duyan Zalim Uralon, kitaptan başını kaldırıyor ve keskin, dağınık dişlerini gözler önüne seriyor.{/n} "Selamlarımı sunuyorum müdafi. İnançsızların kanını dökme zamanı geldi mi? Yoksa Hakikat'in yolu seni bana başka bir sebeple mi getirdi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer's fingers, clad in heavy gauntlets, are leafing through the pages of a grand tome bound in rough, dark leather. Upon hearing your footsteps, Uralon the Cruel looks away from the tome and bares his sharp, uneven teeth.{/n} "I greet you, champion. Is it time to spill the blood of misbelievers? Or has the path of the Truth brought you to me for another purpose?"
